faqs.question: What types of cakes do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a variety of cakes including wedding cakes, birthday cakes, cupcakes, and custom-designed cakes made with fresh ingredients.

faqs.question: How can I place an order?
faqs.answer: You can place an order through our website by selecting your favorite cake and following the checkout process, or by visiting our store in person.

faqs.question: Do you provide cake delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer delivery within the city limits. Delivery charges may apply depending on your location.

faqs.question: Can I customize my cake design?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer custom cake designs based on your preferences, themes, and dietary needs. Contact us for special requests.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation or refund policy?
faqs.answer: Orders can be canceled or modified up to 48 hours before the scheduled delivery or pickup. Refunds are subject to our terms and conditions.

faqs.question: Are your cakes made with organic ingredients?
faqs.answer: We strive to use fresh and high-quality ingredients. Some of our cakes feature organic and locally sourced ingredients. Please check individual product details.

faqs.question: Do you offer cakes for special dietary requirements?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have options for gluten-free, vegan, and sugar-free cakes. Please specify your dietary needs when placing an order.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I place my order?
faqs.answer: We recommend placing your order at least 3-5 days in advance for regular cakes and 7-10 days for custom or wedding cakes.

faqs.question: Can I pick up my order from the store?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose the pickup option during checkout and collect your cake from our store at the scheduled time.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and online payments through our website.
